name: Sampo - Finnish Artifact of Abundance
shortDescription: The Magical Mill of Endless Prosperity
fullDescription:
The Magical Mill of Endless Prosperity The Sampo stands as the most enigmatic and central artifact in Finnish mythology, featured
                    prominently in the Kalevala, the Finnish national epic compiled by Elias Lonnrot from traditional
                    folk poems. Despite its crucial importance to the narrative, the exact nature of the Sampo remains
                    deliberately mysterious. It is described as a magical object that brings prosperity and good fortune
                    to its possessor, but its precise form has been interpreted variously as a mill, a world pillar, a
                    magical vessel, or something entirely beyond physical categorization.

properties.name: Primary Power
properties.value: Endless production of grain, salt, and gold
